from bisect import *
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.sort()
b.sort()
sum = [0] * (n + 1)
for i in range(1, n + 1):
    sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + b[i - 1]
ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    j = bisect_right(b, a[i])
    ans += j * a[i] - sum[j]
    ans += sum[n] - sum[j] - (n - j) * a[i]
    ans -= (n - 1) * abs(a[i] - b[i])
print(ans)
